title: Any upcoming event for 1st yr ppl or all in Opera House (RR Campus)???
content: Any upcoming event for 1st yr ppl or all in Opera House??? I wasn't able to attend any events like fresher's intro celeb.....any upcoming one by the end of 2nd sem ie June???

comments.body:
They'll call you all for a "ritual" at PES right after a new semester starts.

One visit to the opera or MRD auditorium per semester is something you sign up for after joining PESU
Like I didnt get you....so will there be one soon?? as the 2nd sem started a week back??

Yes yes

2 weeks After your sem starts you'll have a pro chancellor and VC addressal
